name: The Meansters: Bootcamp
description:
An archery game where the goal is to pop the hearts that spawn whenever Cupid and his team of cherubs are at work.

Help train the little creatures in the bootcamp so that they can remove Cupid from his throne!

- Play with 4 characters, each with their different shooting styles
- 3 game modes: Time Attack, Survival and Skill Play
- Perform combos by shooting multiple items with a single arrow
- Gain points to unlock over 30 upgrades, Mini-Means, powers and shooting platforms
- No in-app-purchases
- Non-intrusive ads
